All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Actor
Objects which extend Actor can: be detected as intersecting with others provide the number of x and y pixels to move by implement act() method which is called by the WorldController every pulse
Animated
Some actors cycle through sprites to indicate their animation.
Bug
Gives bonus points to the Player for grabbing it.
BugTest  
DivingTurtles
Special case of the Turtles class in which they can dive with a 15% chance per animation cycle.
HomeController
Controls the transitions between the HomeView and WorldView by changing scenes and setting stages.
HomeView
Procedural adding of all GUI components to the first screen seen in the game.
Intersectable
One of the most basic properties of an Object in this game is to Intersectable.
Level
Simple model of each of the four levels in the game.
LevelController
Maintains current level and passes level information between the Level model and WorldView.
LevelControllerTest  
LevelView
LevelView is unaware of what the boss level is; LevelController is relied upon to provide it.
LivesController
Maintains a static reference to the LivesView and provides means to update the number of lives it displays.
LivesControllerTest  
LivesView
Maintains an array of sprites to indicate the number of lives the Player has left.
LivesViewTest  
Log
Constructor handles short and long logs based on the provided width to assign the appropriate image.
LogTest  
Main
Only used to initialise the program; it calls HomeController to handle the stage setting and view population.
MusicController
Provides convenient static methods for the changing of game music.
Player
Many more features than initially in only ~160 lines due to separation-of-concerns.
ScoreBoard
Uses an inner class to model the data for each person's score.
ScoreBoard.BoardEntry
Used in an ArrayList by the read method to store and sort each entry in the CSV file
ScoreBoardTest
Injecting synthetic data sources to ensure robustness when encountering edge cases in the files to read
ScoreController
Communicates with the ScoreBoard model to read the CSV file of high scores and provides ScoreView with updates.
ScoreControllerTest  
ScoreView
Simply displays scores in the formatting defined in the constructor.
Snake
Appears once at the beginning of each level.
Swamp
Fairly complex possible states controlled by SwampController Used as elements in an array and manipulated by the SwampController.
SwampController
Maintains a list of all 5 swamps and whether they have a random crocodile in them or are activated by the player.
SwampControllerTest  
SwampTest
Comprehensive testing of all permutations of logical mutations of a Swamp's states; including the legitimacy of the order of mutation.
TimeController
Provides access to the time remaining of the bar which decreases per life of the player.
TimeView
Defines the properties of the timer bar which resets every level/life.
TimeViewTest  
Turtles
Exemplar extension of the Animated abstract class.
TurtlesTest  
Vehicle
Exemplar extension of the Actor abstract class; clear use of speed in the move() method, which is called by act().
VehicleTest  
WorldController
Sets up the animation timeline, which controls animations of all models.
WorldView
Greatly simplified to just ~27 lines; controllers provide the interface components and the LevelController specifically provides the actors in the first level for use in the WorldView's constructor.
